dict.string: Installation turns Bluetooth on. Removal turns Bluetooth off.

#!/bin/bash
if [[ `/usr/bin/defaults read "/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Bluetooth" ControllerPowerState` -ne 1 ]]; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
